name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Zhongshan North Road, Hangzhou.
The police passed by the crowd, and everyone thought it was a cosplayer and cheered.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Buddha in Shanghai was taken away by the police, the "Jesus" on Zhongshan North Road in Hangzhou was also taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A defecting North Korean People's Army officer called on North Koreans sent to the Russian-Ukrainian battlefield not to work for Kim Jong-un

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news, enter with caution
On October 28, an attack occurred at Beijing Zhongguancun No. 3 Primary School
A middle-aged man in his 50s or 60s chopped and killed elementary school students who had just finished school with a kitchen knife, and many children fell to the ground at the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Chinese government's strict control over Halloween in various places has caused heated discussions. One netizen commented: On the one hand, they say that the door of opening will become wider and wider, but on the other hand, they strictly guard against Western festival culture. Tokyo, New York, and London have not banned the Spring Festival, and even the leaders will actively join the Chinese community to celebrate. China has always said that it wants to be confident, but it has shown itself to be extremely unconfident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 27 (Released) Australia. Local white supremacists came to the Chinese Embassy to demonstrate and demand the extradition of a Chinese man. The man had fled in August after pouring hot coffee on a baby, causing extensive burns on the baby's body. Demonstrators burned the Chinese flag and photos of Xi Jinping, Mao Zedong and the attacker in front of the embassy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/muhIoK79nW

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 25, Huanqiu.com published an article: The United States is the chaos maker in the world. It was ridiculed and boycotted by netizens.
Netizens responded: "Then why did Sima Jiatou buy a house in the United States?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the eve of Halloween in Taiwan, a man cosplayed as a prisoner-wearing version of Ko Wen-je while taking the bus and subway, attracting attention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 27. It was revealed online that the upcoming Halloween theme event "Dancing Lights" in Nanjing was forced to be suspended. Officials said: "Something bad happened on Halloween in Shanghai recently," which attracted the attention of Nanjing, so they started to investigate and the event was forced to be suspended.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Communist Youth League Central Committee shared the book "Xi Jinping and College Students". The book mentioned: Comrade Xi Jinping advocates that young people should "seek hardship for themselves"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens revealed that if you go south from the intersection where the incident occurred, you will find the Central Party School, and on the right are the Haidian District Government and the Haidian District Public Security Bureau.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 27, Guangzhou, Guangdong. A woman posted a video saying that the money she deposited in the Rural Commercial Bank suddenly disappeared, and she received text messages about bank card spending every day. Some netizens said they had the same experience.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A blogger summarized the magical scenes of Halloween in various places this weekend:
The police carefully checked the dolls displayed outside the store to confirm whether there were real people inside.
A real foreigner walking on the street was suspected to be a cosplayer and was questioned by the police.
The police passed by the crowd, and everyone thought it was a cosplayer and cheered.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 27, Kaifeng, Henan. A man cried out in Kaifeng Mansion, "Mr. Bao, I kowtow to you." The security guard pulled the man aside.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 26, Tseng Boen, the host of "The Late Late Show with Boen," won the "Hahahaha Award" for his Taiwan Strait War video "Egg Breaker." He gave a speech expressing his gratitude to China for caring about us and providing us with endless inspiration and creativity. He was so afraid of cross-strait peace.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 26, Sichuan. A rapper wrote a song to diss Lai Qingde: "Lai Qingde, you let young people go to the army, but your son is playing in the United States. By the way, why do you look like a Japanese? You are the kind of person who flatters Japan. I will give you a Japanese name and call you "Licking the Steel Door"."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 26, a Russian posted a video saying: Are China and Russia good brothers? If so, please tell me in the comments section, so that those who are trying to sow discord can see the powerful force of Chinese brothers.
As a result, the comments section was overturned, and many netizens demanded that Russia return the land it had previously occupied.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 27 (Release) A Ukrainian soldier shows a photo of his child in front of the camera.
Many netizens gave him blessings and encouragement in the comment area. "You must return home alive" and "I wish you a safe return home, a warrior who defends your homeland"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 28, China plans to promote positive views on marriage and childbearing in primary and secondary schools and college education.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 27, "Positive Energy Blogger Chao Ma" released a video to refute the rumor that Shanghai is not allowed to celebrate Halloween. She said that illegal gatherings affect traffic and public security, which is fundamentally different from not allowing Halloween. Italy is also discussing whether to celebrate Halloween recently. In fact, Chinese culture is much more open than Europe, but these overseas anti-China forces are engaging in political incitement and cultural invasion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, Weibo has banned several topics related to "Shanghai Halloween".
